name: BConePoolAlarm
0:
”Alexa, turn on pool alarm”
”Alexa, turn off pool alarm”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The BCone Pool Alarm Skill is compatible with the BCone Pool Alarm System and the BCone App. 
Install The BCone Pool Alarm System in your Swimming Pool and the Bcone App in your Mobile Phone before setting up the BCone Pool Alarm Skill.
In order to link the BCone Pool Alarm Skill to your Account, use the same username and password used to register the Bcone App.
The BCone Pool Alarm Skill is used to change the Pool Alarm System State.

Usage Example:
"Alexa, turn on pool alarm"
"Alexa, turn off pool alarm"
